meanings.definition: Showing or having an insensitive and cruel disregard for others.
meanings.sent1: The callalous bully made fun of the other students without any care for their feelings.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her callalous behavior, always ignoring the pain she caused to those around her.
meanings.sent3: The callalous teacher gave extra homework on purpose, just to see the students struggle.
meanings.sent4: His callalous attitude towards animals was evident when he kicked a stray cat for no reason.
meanings.sent5: The callalous dictator showed no mercy, punishing anyone who dared to oppose him.

meanings.definition: Indifferent or unfeeling towards the suffering of others.
meanings.sent1: The callalous millionaire refused to donate any money to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: She remained callalous even when her friend was going through a tough time.
meanings.sent3: The callalous nurse seemed unaffected by the patients' pain, just going through the motions.
meanings.sent4: His callalous behavior towards his family made them feel unloved and neglected.
meanings.sent5: The callalous politician turned a blind eye to the struggles of the working class, focusing only on his own interests.
